title: minimize on close
author: OpenSourceDevelop
body_snippet:
Would be nice to have a "minimize on close" option 

Nice work by the way!

comments.snippet:
What's the benefit of this? There is a reason why there is a close and a minimize button from the application itself - and unless you want to minimize it to the notification area of the task bar (which I personally also don't understand why someone would want to do that ΓÇö maybe one could elaborate on that) I don't see a reason to change the original function of the button. 
There is also already a verification prompt to not close it accidentally if that is the problem...
